summary: Adds a player home to Tel Mithryn
descriptionHtml:
Name: Tel Mithryn Player Home
Version: 1.1
Date: 10/02/2013
Category: Buildings
Author: Princess Stomper
Source: Nexus/Steam
Requires: Skyrim, Dragonborn

=================
Description:
=================

Adds a player house to Tel Mithryn in the Telvanni style of the main tower, called Ruhn Mithryn ("Ruhn" is Dunmeri for "home"). Access is via a new entrance attached to the main tower itself, to the rear (overlooking the sea).

**IF USING A COMPANION, PLEASE USE THE MAGIC-BOTTLE-DOOR OUTSIDE THE ENTRANCE. Companions won't use the regular door and levitation lift**

Accommodation comprises:
- Two bedrooms (one double, one single)
- Extra sleeping area
- Bathroom
- Kitchen/dining area
- Study-lounge
- Alchemy/enchanting area
- Combat/crafting area

Points to note:

1: what looks like a staff enchanter is actually a forge, disguised for aesthetic reasons. I didn't include a staff enchanter because there's one next door

2: The pre-filled shelves are set up as containers for extra storage

3: One of the mannequins doesn't always work. I have no idea why, so best to regard the one on the left as decoration and use the one on the right for storing armor.

4: Occasionally players report not being able to use levitation. Apparently uninstalling/reinstalling the mod will fix it, or unchecking FNIS.

=================
Installation
=================

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

1) De-activate the .esp file
2) Delete the files/folders associated with the mod

=================
Contact:
=================

[see readme]

=================
Credits:
=================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
InsanitySorrow - Pillows, bath, towel
Lilith - filled cupboards, shelves, basin (using resources by InsanitySorrow)
Runspect - toilet
Korana - inspiration

=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================

You may use this as you wish as long as you don't charge money for it and you credit me for any work used. You may translate this mod into any language, provided that you accept responsibility for fixing any errors introduced by the translation. You may upload this mod if you accept responsibility for ensuring the mod is complete with its constituent files and that you are uploading the latest version.
author: Princess Stomper
